Detailed Description

ObitUVDesc Obit uv data descriptor class definition.

This class is derived from the Obit class.

This contains information about the observations and the size and structure of the data.

Usage

Instances can be obtained using the newObitUVDesc constructor the ObitUVDescCopy copy constructor or a pointer duplicated using the ObitUVDescRef function. When an instance is no longer needed, use the ObitUVDescUnref macro to release it.

ObitUVDesc* ObitUVDescCopy (  ObitUVDesc *  in,
ObitUVDesc *  out,
ObitErr *  err
) 
 

Public: Copy UVDesc.

The output descriptor will have the size and reference pixel modified to reflect subimaging on the input, i.e. the output descriptor describes the input. Output will have frequency arrays deallocated, if necessary use ObitUVDescGetFreq to rebuild.

Parameters:
in Pointer to object to be copied.
out Pointer to object to be written. If NULL then a new structure is created.
err ObitErr error stack
Returns:
Pointer to new object.

void ObitUVDescDate2JD (  const gchar *  date,
odouble *  JD
) 
 

Public: Convert Date string to Julian Date.

Algorithm from ACM Algorithm number 199 This routine is good from 1 Mar 1900 indefinitely.

Parameters:
date [in] Date string
date [out] Julian date.

void ObitUVDescGetFreq (  ObitUVDesc *  in,
Obit *  fqtab,
odouble *  SouIFOff,
ObitErr *  err
) 
 

Public: Get Frequency arrays.

These are the freqArr, fscale, freqIF sideband, and chIncIF array members.

Parameters:
in Descriptor to update.
fqtab FQ table with IF frequency information Actually an ObitTable but passed as parent class to avoid If NUll no FQ table available - use defaults from header circular definitions inf include files.
SouIFOff if NonNULL, source dependent values to be added to the IF frequencies. Includes selection by IF.
err ObitErr for reporting errors.

gboolean ObitUVDescShift3DMatrix (  ObitUVDesc *  uvDesc,
ObitImageDesc *  imDesc,
ofloat  URot3D[3][3],
ofloat  PRot3D[3][3]
) 
 

Public: Phase and UV re-projection matrices for 3D imaging.

They are not needed for -NCP which should not use 3D imaging. Algorithm adapted from AIPS. PRJMAT.FOR (E. W. Greisen author)

Parameters:
uvDesc UV data descriptor giving initial position
imDesc Image descriptor giving desired position
URot3D [out] 3D rotation matrix for uv plane
PRot3D [out] 3D rotation matrix for image plane
Returns:
TRUE if these rotation need to be applied.

gboolean ObitUVDescShift3DPos (  ObitUVDesc *  uvDesc,
ofloat  shift[2],
ofloat  mrotat,
ofloat  URot3D[3][3],
ofloat  PRot3D[3][3]
) 
 

Public: Phase and UV re-projection matrices for 3D imaging for a given posn.

They are not needed for -NCP which should not use 3D imaging. Version for a given offset and rotation from the UV data Algorithm adapted from AIPS. PRJMAT.FOR (E. W. Greisen author)

Parameters:
uvDesc UV data descriptor giving initial position
shift RA and Dec offsets(deg) from uv position
mrotat rotation in degrees of offset image
URot3D [out] 3D rotation matrix for uv plane
PRot3D [out] 3D rotation matrix for image plane
Returns:
TRUE if these rotation need to be applied.

void ObitUVDescShiftPhase (  ObitUVDesc *  uvDesc,
ObitImageDesc *  imDesc,
ofloat  dxyzc[3],
ObitErr *  err
) 
 

Public: Get position phase shift parameters from image descriptor.

Recognizes "-SIN" and "-NCP" projections. Assumes 3D imaging for -SIN and not for -NCP. Apdapted from AIPS.

Parameters:
uvDesc UV data descriptor
imDesc Image descriptor.
dxyzc (out) the derived shift parameters.
err ObitErr for reporting errors.

void ObitUVDescShiftPosn (  ObitUVDesc *  uvDesc,
ofloat  xShift,
ofloat  yShift,
ofloat  dxyzc[3],
ObitErr *  err
) 
 

Public: Get position phase shift parameters from a shift.

Recognizes "-SIN" and "-NCP" projections. Assumes 3D imaging for -SIN and not for -NCP.

Parameters:
uvDesc UV data descriptor
xShift Shift from ra in deg.
yShift Shift from dec in deg.
dxyzc (out) the derived shift parameters.
err ObitErr for reporting errors.
